Lore of the Wheel.name: Lore of the Wheel
Lore of the Wheel.flavor: Black shadow fills your gaze for a moment, as your mind delves deep into the accumulated knowledge of all beings.
Lore of the Wheel.target: You or an allied Keeper of the Everflow in the burst
Lore of the Wheel.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +5 bonus to skill checks. The target can use any skill as if he or she had training in that skill.
